name: visio-metrics
description: VisioMetrics is a cutting-edge data visualization platform designed to transform your raw data into actionable insights. Whether you're tracking social media engagement, monitoring financial markets, analyzing e-commerce sales, or visualizing health data, VisioMetrics empowers you to make informed decisions with confidence.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Justin Connors
